channel.title: Docs on Mooshak
channel.description: Recent content in Docs on Mooshak

item.title: Server
item.description: Mooshak Server # Setup # To setup a mooshak server you will need git, docker and docker compose installed. Go to directory of your choice and clone the project. $ git clone https://github.com/sepgh/mooshak Next, go to newly cloned mooshak directory and then navigate to server directory. After that you can start mooshak by runing the docker compose: $ cd mooshak # cloned directory $ cd server # server scripts $ docker compose up -d # or: docker-compose up -d Congradulations!

item.title: Windows Client
item.description: Mooshak Windows Client # This page describess how to run Mooshak Windows Client. This client is written in python for easier development in future. There is no pre-built executable ready at this moment. If you don’t want to install python you can try poormans vpn batch script. Requirements # To use Mooshak windows client, you will need to install python interpreter installed on your system(tested on 3.8, but 3.6+ is enough).
